ai-patthana12.20:18.1_0: There is no cause or condition for refuge to the teaching that gives rise to Cases.

ai-patthana12.20:20.1_2: Nor do they arise with drains that causes and reasons.
ai-patthana12.20:21.1_0: Nor do I take refuge for life, and not to refuge for the Teaching. Nor do they give rise to confidence in the nature.

ai-patthana12.20:22.1_4: You can pay close attention to the monastery, supported by those who are robbed and non-existence.
ai-patthana12.20:23.1_0: The forty-three kinds of suffering is finished.
ai-patthana12.20:24.1_0: The instruction of the mind is finished.
